column2: Chosen by [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap]

In the ancient prophecies of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith, it is written that a hero, the champion of [Root.Religion.GetName], will be chosen from amongst his servants to start the end of times. This Chosen One will end to the conflict that plagues the world and bring about the new [Root.Religion.GetName] order. Recently, a figure of such characteristics has risen in [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName], [From.GetTitledFirstName] [From.GetOnlyDynastyName], the chosen one of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap]!

This character is purported to be the chosen one of his or her messianic faith.
